languages.text: Катастрофа! Причудливое варп-колдовство связало проникшего сквозь поле Геллера демона с одним из пустотников, служащих в команде макропушки. Верный слуга Императора превратился в проповедника, собирающего вокруг себя очарованных Архиврагом людей — нужно остановить это безумие!

Disaster! Bizarre warp sorcery has linked a daemon, one that has breached the Geller field, to one of the voidsmen from the macro-cannon crew. A former faithful servant of the Emperor has now become a heretic preacher gathering a flock of those bewitched by the Archenemy — this madness must be brought to an end!
languages.original_text: Катастрофа! Причудливое варп-колдовство связало проникшего сквозь поле Геллера демона с одним из пустотников, служащих в команде макропушки. Верный слуга Императора превратился в проповедника, собирающего вокруг себя очарованных Архиврагом людей — нужно остановить это безумие!

traits.locale_text: Disaster! Bizarre warp sorcery has linked a daemon, one that has breached the Geller Field, to one of the voidsmen from the macro-cannon crew. A former faithful servant of the Emperor has now become a heretic preacher gathering a flock of those bewitched by the Archenemy — this madness must be brought to an end!

Disaster! Bizarre warp sorcery has linked a daemon, one that has breached the Geller field, to one of the voidsmen from the macro-cannon crew. A former faithful servant of the Emperor has now become a heretic preacher gathering a flock of those bewitched by the Archenemy — this madness must be brought to an end!

Disaster! Bizarre warp sorcery has linked a daemon, one that has breached the Geller field, to one of the voidsmen from the macro-cannon crew. A former faithful servant of the Emperor has now become a heretic preacher gathering a flock of those bewitched by the Archenemy — this madness must be brought to an end!

languages.text: 灾难发生了！古怪的亚空间巫术把一个闯入盖勒立场的恶魔和一个船员绑定在了一起。这个曾经忠诚的帝皇之仆如今已变成了异端的布道士，身边聚集了一群被混沌大敌蛊惑的人。这种疯狂行径必须结束！
languages.original_text: Disaster! Bizarre warp sorcery has linked a daemon, one that has breached the Geller field, to one of the voidsmen from the macro-cannon crew. A former faithful servant of the Emperor has now become a heretic preacher gathering a flock of those bewitched by the Archenemy — this madness must be brought to an end!

traits.locale_text: 灾难发生了！古怪的亚空间巫术把一个闯入盖勒立场的恶魔和一个船员绑定在了一起。这个曾经忠诚的帝皇之仆如今已变成了异端的布道士，身边聚集了一群被混沌大敌蛊惑的人。这种疯狂行径必须结束！

languages.text: ¡Catástrofe! Una extraña hechicería de la disformidad ha vinculado a un daemon, que ha atravesado el Campo Geller, con uno de los hombres del vacío de la tripulación del macrocañón. Un antiguo fiel servidor del Emperador se ha convertido ahora en un predicador hereje que reúne a un rebaño de hechizados por el Archienemigo. ¡Hay que acabar con esta locura!
languages.original_text: Disaster! Bizarre warp sorcery has linked a daemon, one that has breached the Geller field, to one of the voidsmen from the macro-cannon crew. A former faithful servant of the Emperor has now become a heretic preacher gathering a flock of those bewitched by the Archenemy — this madness must be brought to an end!

traits.locale_text: ¡Catástrofe! Una extraña hechicería de la disformidad ha vinculado a un daemon, que ha atravesado el Campo Geller, con uno de los hombres del vacío de la tripulación del macrocañón. Un antiguo fiel servidor del Emperador se ha convertido ahora en un predicador hereje que reúne a un rebaño de hechizados por el Archienemigo. ¡Hay que acabar con esta locura!

languages.text: 最悪の事態だ！不可思議な<歪み>魔術が、ゲラーフィールドを突破したディーモンと、マクロキャノンのクルーのヴォイズマンをリンクさせた。今や皇帝の元忠実な従者は、異端の説教者へと落ちぶれて、宿敵に魅せられた群集を集めている…この狂気を終わらせるのだ！
languages.original_text: Disaster! Bizarre warp sorcery has linked a daemon, one that has breached the Geller field, to one of the voidsmen from the macro-cannon crew. A former faithful servant of the Emperor has now become a heretic preacher gathering a flock of those bewitched by the Archenemy — this madness must be brought to an end!

traits.locale_text: 最悪の事態だ！不可思議な<歪み>魔術が、ゲラーフィールドを突破したディーモンと、マクロキャノンのクルーのヴォイズマンをリンクさせた。今や皇帝の元忠実な従者は、異端の説教者へと落ちぶれて、宿敵に魅せられた群集を集めている…この狂気を終わらせるのだ！

languages.text: C'est un désastre ! Un étrange sortilège du Warp a amalgamé l'un des démons ayant franchi le champ de Geller à un cosmomarin de l'équipage du macro-canon. Cet ancien fidèle serviteur de l'Empereur s'est transformé en prêcheur hérétique ; il tente désormais de rassembler tous ceux qui ont succombé à l'influence du Grand Ennemi... Il faut mettre un terme à cette folie !
languages.original_text: Disaster! Bizarre warp sorcery has linked a daemon, one that has breached the Geller field, to one of the voidsmen from the macro-cannon crew. A former faithful servant of the Emperor has now become a heretic preacher gathering a flock of those bewitched by the Archenemy — this madness must be brought to an end!

traits.locale_text: C'est un désastre ! Un étrange sortilège du Warp a amalgamé l'un des démons ayant franchi le champ de Geller à un cosmomarin de l'équipage du macro-canon. Cet ancien fidèle serviteur de l'Empereur s'est transformé en prêcheur hérétique ; il tente désormais de rassembler tous ceux qui ont succombé à l'influence du Grand Ennemi... Il faut mettre un terme à cette folie !

languages.text: Katastrophe! Bizarre Warpzauberei hat eine Verbindung hergestellt zwischen einem Dämon, der das Gellerfeld durchbrochen hat, und einem Raumfahrer aus der Makrokanonen-Crew. Ein ehemaliger treuer Diener des Imperators ist heute ein ketzerischer Prediger. Er versammelt Gläubige um sich, die vom Erzfeind verzaubert wurden — dieser Irrsinn muss ein Ende haben!
languages.original_text: Disaster! Bizarre warp sorcery has linked a daemon, one that has breached the Geller field, to one of the voidsmen from the macro-cannon crew. A former faithful servant of the Emperor has now become a heretic preacher gathering a flock of those bewitched by the Archenemy — this madness must be brought to an end!

traits.locale_text: Katastrophe! Bizarre Warpzauberei hat eine Verbindung hergestellt zwischen einem Dämon, der das Gellerfeld durchbrochen hat, und einem Raumfahrer aus der Makrokanonen-Crew. Ein ehemaliger treuer Diener des Imperators ist heute ein ketzerischer Prediger. Er versammelt Gläubige um sich, die vom Erzfeind verzaubert wurden — dieser Irrsinn muss ein Ende haben!

languages.text: Felaket! Tuhaf bir öteboyut sahirliği, Geller alanını delen bir iblisi makro top mürettebatındaki bir uçsuz eriyle bağladı. İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârı, artık Şerbaşı'nın büyüsüne kapılanları toplayan, kâfir bir vaize dönüştü. Bu delilik derhâl sona erdirilmeli!
languages.original_text: Disaster! Bizarre warp sorcery has linked a daemon, one that has breached the Geller field, to one of the voidsmen from the macro-cannon crew. A former faithful servant of the Emperor has now become a heretic preacher gathering a flock of those bewitched by the Archenemy — this madness must be brought to an end!
